info.name: MOP Backend - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for MOP Backend application including all modules: Authentication, Users, Sliders, Categories, Services, Contact Us, Testimonials, Gallery, About, Settings, and Uploads.

item.name: 01 - Authentication
item.description: API endpoints for user authentication including sign-up, sign-in, and access token management

request.description: Register a new user account

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "User created successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "uuid-here",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "profileUrl": "https://example.com/profile.jpg",
    "role": "user",
    "isActive": true,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}

request.description: Authenticate user and get access token

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get new access token using refresh token

response.name: Success Response

item.name: 02 - Users
item.description: API endpoints for user management including CRUD operations and user profile management

request.description: Get current authenticated user information

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{

  "message": "User retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "uuid-here",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "profileUrl": "https://example.com/profile.jpg",
    "role": "user",
    "isActive": true,

    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}

query.description: Search term for name or email

request.description: Get all users with pagination and filtering (Super Admin only)

response.name: Success Response

item.name: 03 - Sliders
item.description: API endpoints for hero slider management including CRUD operations and reordering

query.description: Sort field (created_at, updated_at, orderNumber, title, isActive)

request.description: Get all sliders with filtering, sorting, and pagination

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get single slider by ID

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get multiple sliders by IDs using query parameters

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Sliders retrieved successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "uuid-1",
      "title": "Slider 1",
      "subtitle": "Description 1",
      "buttonText": "Button 1",

      "buttonText": "Button 2",
      "buttonUrl": "https://example.com/2",

      "isActive": true

  ]
}

request.description: Get multiple sliders by IDs using request body

item.name: 04 - Categories
item.description: API endpoints for category management including CRUD operations and add-ons

query.description: Search term for name, tagline, or description
Filter categories shown on home page only (true/false)

request.description: Get all categories with filtering, sorting, and pagination

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get single category details by ID

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
